content: As an AI language model, I cannot attach images. However, you can easily find maps of the new Metro lines by doing a quick online search. You can start by looking up the official website of the Metro transit authority in your area or the city where the new Metro lines are being constructed. Many transit authorities also have mobile apps that provide interactive maps and route planning features, making it easy to plan your travel accordingly. Additionally, you can check online maps and transportation apps like Google Maps, which usually include information on public transportation routes, schedules, and fares.
